title: New pumpkin spice foods from cakes to coffee and more ...

article.title: New pumpkin spice foods from cakes to coffee and more ...
article.description:
New pumpkin spice foods from cakes to coffee and more fall flavors - Good Morning America
* [Food](https://www.goodmorningamerica.com/food)
# New pumpkin spice foods from cakes to coffee and more fall flavors
![](https://i.abcnewsfe.com/a/2690bd60-6b26-4b77-91e9-cfa11a9fa836/NBC_PumpkinSpiceBundt_3822_1759341256878_hpMain_16x9.jpg?w=992)
1:45
Pumpkin spice latte returns to Starbucks
Nothing Bundt Cakes
![Kelly McCarthy](https://s.abcnews.com/images/GMA/KELLY-MCCARTHY_1x1_992.jpg?w=96)
By[Kelly McCarthy](https://www.goodmorningamerica.com/author/Kelly_McCarthy)
October 01, 2025, 5:27 PM
* * * * * The cool kiss of an Autumn breeze brings a crisp first-taste of fall and[brands](https://www.goodmorningamerica.com/food/story/starbucks-announces-psl-release-date-new-drink-fall-123932254)have already appealed to American consumers dropping new flavors that will be a perfect fit for cozy days ahead with notes of pumpkin spice, apple and more.
## New pumpkin spice, fall-flavored products hit shelves early
**Nothing Bundt Cakes**
![](https://i.abcnewsfe.com/a/61cab49c-76b5-4abc-9255-96d777a2b814/PumpkinSpice_Bundtinis_BiteOut-HZ-9847_1759340691697_hpEmbed_3x2.jpg?w=992)
The fall-favorite Pumpkin Spice mini personal sized bundt cakes from Nothing Bundt Cakes available through Dec. 7, 2025.
Nothing Bundt Cakes
Nothing Bundt Cakes announced its Cheers to Autumn collection -- an assortment that includes the return of the beloved Pumpkin Spice cake, plus a brand-new Biscoff Cookie Butter Cake.
Pumpkin Spice, which blends the essential flavors of pumpkin and warm spices, is available in all sizes from Sept. 8 through Dec. 7.
![](https://i.abcnewsfe.com/a/d811c6d1-f3b8-41b2-a939-bb446cc5db33/CookieButterBundtlet_BiteOut_NoAcorns-HZ-9688_1759340691652_hpEmbed_3x2.jpg?w=992)
A new Biscoff Cookie Butter Cake from Nothing Bundt Cakes available through Oct. 12, 2025.
Nothing Bundt Cakes
The new Biscoff Cookie Butter Cake, available in personal-sized bundts, has the sweet cookie butter ba
